## Key Concepts Learned
GitHub lingo
- Repo(sitory) - folder for project files
- Commit - snapshot/draft of work
- Push & pull - sending/receiving changes via GitHub cloud

Quarto
- Like a newer version of R Markdown - same basic concept, new features (including multiple coding languages)
- Professional presentation (can create websites, presentations, PDFs)
- YAML header
